content.tagline: The device that gets down to business
content.text:
Ultra-light, ultra-tough, and built for business. The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Ultrabook delivers serious style and substance for enterprise computing. Discover a bold design that’s backed by powerful performance—featuring an Intel® Core™ i7 vPro™ processor, integrated security and military-grade durability.

Empower your business, IT, and end-users with the deeply personal and powerfully productive ThinkPad X1 Carbon.

features.name: Performance with style
features.text: The 14-inch ThinkPad X1 Carbon combines a distinctive design with a breakthrough performance architecture. It delivers supercharged technology that’s built to impress, powered by an Intel Core i7 vPro processor and ultrafast PCIe SSD storage.

features.name: Anywhere, Anytime Productivity
features.text: Starting at just 2.6 lbs./1.18 kg and 0.65 inch/16.5 mm thin, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon is extremely portable. Plus, it provides up to 11 hours of battery life and optional LTE-A connectivity—enabling serious productivity from virtually anywhere.

features.name: Powerfully Secure and Manageable
features.text: The ThinkPad X1 Carbon keeps your data safer than ever, while also simplifying IT support. It comes with the Touch Sensor Fingerprint Reader, as well as robust hardware-assisted security features such as Trusted Platform Module (TPM) support.

features.name: Real-World Durability
features.text: Rigorously tested. Built to military-grade specifications. The ThinkPad X1 Carbon can withstand the hazards of everyday, everywhere computing. Features include a satellite-grade carbon fiber frame, spill-resistant keyboard, and shatter-resistant glass.
